attributes.action: Revision of law regarding knowingly sending indecent images and messages to a minor.
attributes.additional_details:
This is a request to close the loopholes that currently exist in the laws regarding abuse of children online and to amend the Sex Offences Act 2003 to allow prosecution of guilty parties.
They are clearly inadequate and allow for paedophiles to send graphic images and messages to children and not even receive a caution for the offences, whilst you still lock people up for having no TV licence???
 This is NOT acceptable and as the public see more and more offenders getting away with crimes they are clearly guilty of, they will obviously be angry.
 We hope you take notice and act before people take matters into their own hands.
